title: Need help identifying this TV show font
content:
Hey guys,  
I'm new around here and I'm hoping someone could help me out.

I want to find what the font is for the logo of the HBO show "Entourage." Image below:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141122090458im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ent_s4_logo_4743.gif)

Thanks in advance!  
-Akshay
author: akshay03

comments.content:
Apologies! Again, I'm new here so I didn't know where to go.

But thanks, that looks like what I want!!

:)
